content: this is another pokemon on my daughter s always growing to do list that she started when pokemon go came out once again it took a customer on etsy requesting swirlix for me to finally get around to making it for her this pattern includes the yarn colors for making swirlix and shiny swirlix materials worsted weight yarn shiny alternative in parenthesizes white buff baby pink café latte perfect pink and black e crochet hook polyester fiberfill yarn needle
